content.text: 1 1/2 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 1/2 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, mix the teriyaki sauce, oyster sauce, soy sauce, ketchup, garlic powder, gin, liquid smoke, and sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the teriyaki sauce"@24:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "oyster sauce"@44:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "soy sauce"@58:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "ketchup"@69:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "garlic powder"@78:91 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "gin"@93:96 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "liquid smoke"@98:110 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "sugar"@116:121 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place the chicken wings in the bowl, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator 8 hours or overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the chicken wings"@9:26 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "the bowl"@30:38 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cover"@40:45 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-2 "marinate"@51:59 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-1 "the refrigerator"@63:79 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "8 hours"@80:87 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-1-1 "overnight"@91:100 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Preheat the grill for low heat.
4) Arrange chicken on the grill, and discard the marinade.
5) Grill the chicken wings on one side for 20 minutes, then turn and brush with honey.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Grill"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "the chicken wings"@9:26 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "on one side"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "20 minutes"@43:53 / DUR )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "turn and brush"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "honey"@80:85 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Continue grilling 25 minutes, or until juices run clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "grilling"@12:20 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "25 minutes"@21:31 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until juices run clear"@36:58 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
